title: Bloomberg Markets: Symantec CEO on Ransomware `Worm'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Symantec CEO on Ransomware `Worm'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Gregory Clark Chief Executive Officer Symantec Discussing the investigation and impact of  the global ransomware attack.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
